Still they are in private repo, will make those public soon.

- Efficient storage of data storage using File System, SQLite, Core Data.
- Worked with QA leads, Graphic Design leads, Project Managers to effectively develop applications.

- I am working on my newsletter where I will be sending some interesting questions on Swift, Python, System Design, Data Structures and Algorithms. Please send me an email at hello@boudhayan.com
